sentences.en: Ceramic - matrix composite materials is composed by matrix and reinforcement.
sentences.cn: 陶瓷基复合材料是由基体陶瓷材料和增强相构成的复合材料.

sentences.en: Ceramic elements are made by pressing and sintering finely powdered material s.
sentences.cn: 陶瓷元件是将仔细研磨的材料经过加压和烧结制成.

sentences.en: Chengkuntai Ceramic Factory specializes in ceramic designing and producing.
sentences.cn: 成坤泰陶瓷厂,是一家专业从事陶瓷设计,生产制作的工厂.

sentences.en: Common ceramic elements are barium titanate and lead zirconate - titanate.
sentences.cn: 普通的陶瓷元件分别是钛酸钡和锆钛酸铅.

sentences.en: I make ceramic cups there. Do you remember the gift I gave you for your last birthday? Those two cups?
sentences.cn: 在那里，我可以自己制作陶瓷茶杯。还记得你上次生日时我送你的礼物吗？那两个茶杯？

sentences.en: Latest progress and research status of laser cladding ceramic coating was summarized.
sentences.cn: 综述了激光熔覆稀土陶瓷涂层研究现状及其最新进展.

sentences.en: Piezoelectric ceramic is used widely for ultrasonic fish finder.
sentences.cn: 压电陶瓷广泛应用于超声波鱼探仪.

sentences.en: Silicate Aluminum refractory ( ceramic ) fiber ropes, cloths, strips, packings and sleevings.
sentences.cn: 硅酸铝 ( 陶瓷 ) 耐火纤维编绳 、 布 、 带 、 扭绳、盘根、套管等.

sentences.en: Some ceramic works of art are shown in this exhibition.
sentences.cn: 这次展览会上展出了一些陶瓷艺术品.

sentences.en: The ceramic lamp and wick change, but the light's the same.
sentences.cn: 陶制的灯与灯芯会改变, 但灯光都是一样的.

sentences.en: The order for ceramic tiles has been booked in.
sentences.cn: 瓷砖的订单已登记下来了.

sentences.en: The roofs are covered with more than 1,056,000 Swedish made ceramic tiles in white and cream.
sentences.cn: 屋顶为瑞典制造的105.6万多块陶瓷所覆盖,呈乳白色.

sentences.en: The walls and floors are clad with ceramic tiles.
sentences.cn: 墙面和地板上都贴着瓷砖。

sentences.en: These ceramic tiles are the ultimate in modern kitchen design.
sentences.cn: 这种瓷砖是现代厨房装修中的极品.

sentences.en: This takes a little while to switch all of your plastic storage containers over to ceramic, glass or stainless steel but its definitely worthwhile.
sentences.cn: 把你所有的塑料存储容器换成陶瓷的，玻璃的，或者不锈钢的你会浪费你一点时间。 但这绝对是值得的。

sentences.en: Use high strength ceramic shaft, reliable and durable, low operating noise.
sentences.cn: 采用高强度陶瓷轴, 经久耐用, 噪音极低.

sentences.en: Various ceramic materials have been suggested as supports for reforming catalyst.
sentences.cn: 各种陶土管用作转化催化剂的载体.

words.tran_cn: [陶瓷]陶瓷的；陶器的；制陶艺术的

phrases.tran_cn: 陶瓷纤维；耐火陶瓷纤维
n. 陶瓷材料；陶瓷原料
陶瓷；陶瓷基片；陶瓷衬底
n. 瓷砖（有釉或无釉的）

trans.tran_en: Ceramic is clay that has been heated to a very high temperature so that it becomes hard
